titles.title: Recognizing the independence of the courts of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 9/13/2006--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that: (1) the Congress hereby commits itself to exercise additional restraint regarding the passage of bills that limit the jurisdiction of the courts of the United States; and (2) these courts should continue to adjudicate cases alleging conflicts between Acts of Congress and the Constitution of the United States.
